item.description:
Please RSVP!

This meeting features a special presentation by B.I.G. member Douglas Chin

Investing Strategically in Today’s Market 

Doug will review the markets with some charts as well as talk about trading from a preparation and process perspective.

 

Douglas L Chin,  Financial Advisor, Merrill Lynch 

Douglas started his private practice at Merrill Lynch to serve the wealth management needs of established individuals, families and business owners.  He focuses on using a disciplined investment management approach to help his clients explore, discover and attain their short and long term financial goals through the development of highly individualized strategies.

Douglas has worked in the financial services industry since 2000 and has a deep understanding of the global financial markets including in-depth knowledge of the U.S. stock markets.  Prior to joining Merrill Lynch, Douglas worked at a prestigious hedge fund in New York City, where he developed, tested and executed complex trading strategies for a multi-million dollar portfolio. 

Douglas holds the Series 7 and 66 registrations as supervised by the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA).  He is a Certified Special Needs Advisor (CSNA).

 

To join our online discussion go to
http://groups.google.com/bostonibd

If you have a friend you talk stocks with, bring them with you!

Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room.

We strongly urge each person to make his or her own decisions about investing their money. Investment ideas and recommendations made during our meetings and in our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone.

This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required, but please RSVP.

 You pick the topic and we will discuss it en groupe.
item.name: Boston Investor's Group Wednesday Meetup
